about_the_game:
World of Warships doesn’t only look good, it also sounds awesome!

The music of our game has conquered the hearts of many players, so the game music composers themselves have selected 21 tracks for your enjoyment. Our soundtrack stands ready to inspire you with nautical notes that are guaranteed to make any task you accomplish while listening to it approximately 150% more daring and epic!

The tracks are available in both the mp3 and flac (lossless) audio formats. You are free to use them on streams and videos.

Have fun listening, Commanders!
detailed_description:
World of Warships doesn’t only look good, it also sounds awesome!

The music of our game has conquered the hearts of many players, so the game music composers themselves have selected 21 tracks for your enjoyment. Our soundtrack stands ready to inspire you with nautical notes that are guaranteed to make any task you accomplish while listening to it approximately 150% more daring and epic!

The tracks are available in both the mp3 and flac (lossless) audio formats. You are free to use them on streams and videos.

Have fun listening, Commanders!

name: World of Warships — Composer’s Choice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 136 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 670 MB available space

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")

short_description: World of Warships doesn’t only look good, it also sounds awesome!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*
*languages with full audio support
